retrieve_artifact.name: Retrieve Artifact
retrieve_artifact.description: An anomalous energy signature has been detected. Secure the source and return to the shuttle for analysis.

assassinate_target.name: Eliminate HVT
assassinate_target.description: A high-value alien bioform is commanding local forces. Neutralize it to disrupt their command structure.

exterminate_hive.name: Clear and Secure
exterminate_hive.description: Hostile nests have been located. Destroy all of them to secure the sector.
